item.title: NEWS CORP 10-K
item.description: NEWS CORP, which is in the Newspapers: Publishing Or Publishing & Printing [2711] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 12, 2022 had 52652 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 1277 instances million - 588 instances 2022 - 565 instances fiscal - 448 instances june - 448 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
